arts.ttl: Luxembourg vs Northern Ireland – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Luxembourg and Northern Ireland go head-to-head in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers on Thursday evening. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to their Group A campaign, in an intriguing group that also contains Germany and Slovakia. Luxembourg vs Northern Ireland – Match preview and team news Date: Thursday, 4th September. Kick-off: 7:45pm BST. arts.ttl: Northern Ireland XI vs Luxembourg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Luxembourg and Northern Ireland kick off their 2026 FIFA World Cup European Qualifying campaigns on Thursday at Stade de Luxembourg, with both sides aiming to start Group A on a winning note.
